Title: Li Hongzhi is an absolute cult leader
Designer: Zhang Hongwei (张宏伟)Kong Simeng (孔思孟)
Publisher: Zhongyang minzu daxue chubanshe (中央民族大学出版社)
Notes: First sheet of the series Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cults (私扬正气铲除邪教), published in 2001.The poster shows cult leaders from all over the world, including David Koresh, the head of the Branch Davidians.
Theme: Privately encourage healthy practices, eradicate evil cultsFalun Gong
